[Home](./index.md) &gt; [react-native-webshell](./react-native-webshell.md) &gt; [MakeFeatureParams](./react-native-webshell.makefeatureparams.md)

## MakeFeatureParams interface

An object to specify attributes of the feature.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface MakeFeatureParams<E extends string, P> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [eventHandlerName](./react-native-webshell.makefeatureparams.eventhandlername.md) | E | The name of the event handler. The convention is to name it <code>on</code> + PascalCase event name. |
|  [identifier](./react-native-webshell.makefeatureparams.identifier.md) | string | A unique identifier of the feature. The convention is to use a reverse namespace domain ending with the event name. |
|  [payloadType](./react-native-webshell.makefeatureparams.payloadtype.md) | P | Placeholder value to infer P. |
|  [script](./react-native-webshell.makefeatureparams.script.md) | string | The string containing valid ECMAScript 5 to be run in the WebView. |
